Barbie: A Fairy Secret

Banner Background | Box Art | Cast Ensemble Image | Cast in Character Image | Iconic Header Image | Logo | Poster

G • 2011 • 73 mins

Program Description
Barbie lets you in on a secret! When Ken is flown away to a fairy land, Barbie and her rival Raquelle must work together and learn that real magic lies in the power of friendship.
